Uses of Class
uniandes.unacloud.agent.exceptions.PlatformOperationException

  • Packages that use PlatformOperationException 
    Package Description
    uniandes.unacloud.agent.execution.configuration
    In this package are located all classes to configure executions based in operating system
    uniandes.unacloud.agent.execution.entities
    In this package are located all entities used in agent to save and control information
    uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform
    In this package are located all classes to manage platforms processes to configure and execute images
    uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform.VirtualBox
    In this package are located all classes to virtualbox platform
    uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform.VMware
    In this package are located all classes to manage VmWare platforms
